group_1.narration: Time has passed since then, @and I've taken more photos than I can count.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I like this one!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it's a very nice smile. @Even Ryo said it was a good photo!

group_1.narration: Even so, while time has brought @more and more photos of happiness, @Mikazuki Villa's visitors are still @suffering the same problems.
I can listen to their stories, @but there's nothing I can do beyond that...
I just don't know how to make other people happy...
I wish I could be the one giving others happiness...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, there you are, Iroha! @You were in the living room.

group_1.textRight: ...What are you two up to?

group_1.textLeft: We're developing the photos I took and @assembling them into an album.
We were thinking about what Ui and I have been @through since coming to Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see!
You've taken a lot of pictures since then. @You've gotten really good at this!
Oh, this picture is from Alina's exhibition!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, thinking back...

group_1.narration: "Karin introduced me to an artist named Alina, @and we went to her exhibition."

group_1.textLeft: That was...amazing, but hard for me to grasp...

group_1.textRight: Me, too... Maybe I'm too young for this?
Um... Excuse me...!
I have some extra tickets to that museum...
By any chance...do you guys want them?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry... We just finished our visit.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: Erm... Is something the matter?

group_1.textRight: No...it's just, I was supposed to come here @with the person I like...
Except I got my heart broken... Haha...
I thought about going by myself, but I couldn't @bring myself to do it...
But then the tickets would go to waste, @so I wanted to see if anyone could take them.
...Oh, what am I saying?@[chara:303101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303101:cheek_0][chara:303101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:303101:lipSynch_1]Haha... Sorry for bothering you...

group_1.textCenter: No waaay! I could've sworn it was right here?!
Did I drop my ticket or something?! @Totally craaaazy!

group_1.textLeft: That girl...could she...?

group_1.textRight: Yaaaaay! I found just the right person!
Thanks a billion!
I wanted to go to the museum so I could learn @how to be more mature!
Oh yeah, the name's Emiri! Nice to meetcha!

group_1.textLeft: And I'm Rika! Nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Who're these two?

group_1.textLeft: I was chatting with them both, and that's @how I found you!

group_1.textRight: So they're, like, my rescuers too!
Alright, that means we're friends @from now on, got it?!

group_1.textLeft: We've hung out together from time to time @ever since then.

group_1.textRight: They've really taught us a lot about @Kamihama City, haven't they?
Oh, is this one from an arcade?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh...yeah... That was a hard one...

group_1.narration: "Rena and I were at the arcade together, @when this girl we didn't know @suddenly approached us, and we got roped @into going to a game tournament..."

group_1.textRight: I've been coming here a lot since I moved @to Kamihama City.
I've seen you around sometimes, and kept @an eye on you for your skills.
Say, you wanna be on my team for @the crane game tournament?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* You've got an eye for quality. @If you insist!

group_1.textCenter: (Erm...what should I do...? @I guess I'll just watch...)
(Oh, is that girl going to be @in the competition, too...?)

group_1.textRight: ...What're you lookin' at?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I...I was wondering if you were going @to the tournament, too.

group_1.textRight: ...I was just curious, so I swung by here @while I was in Kamihama anyway.
Didn't realize you had to be in teams...
And I don't have the guts to ask one of them @if I could join...
...[chara:102301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102301:cheek_0][chara:102301:motion_0][chara:102301:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:102301:lipSynch_1Hey.
You free right now? I'll tell you what...

group_1.narration: "So, that girl, her name was Ao...@She and I entered the tournament, @but Rena and her partner, Ranka, @were a formidable duo..."
"I'm horrible at games, so I dragged us down @and made us lose big time...but..."

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry... We lost all because of me...

group_1.textRight: Jeez...you're shockingly bad at this.
...Still, it was fun playing with you.
So thanks for that, Iroha. @...Let's do it again sometime.

group_1.textLeft: We've been in touch ever since.
We talk about all kinds of things, like her @favorite board games.
I've learned a lot from her.
I mean, the tournament was really hard @for me to participate in,
but it's one of my fondest memories now. @I'm happy we became good friends.

group_1.textRight: It looks like there's a photograph here @for each person you've met...!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there really is. And all of that has been @making me wonder...
...if there's something I can do to repay @everyone's kindness.
I'm always receiving happiness from people,
so I wish I could give that back to others...

group_1.textRight: I, for one, am just so glad to have met you all!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but...it hasn't all been good things.
For example, my encounter with these two @didn't turn out so well...
I met a pair of twins, Tsukuyo and Tsukasa.
They were having a falling-out when I happened @to pass by...

group_1.textRight: So you expect us to get along @just 'cause we're twins?!

group_1.textLeft: What do you know of our circumstances?!
However much I would like for the two of us @to be friends...

group_1.textRight: There's no bridging the divide between us!

group_1.textLeft: My meddling only enraged them further...
I really regret it. Which is precisely why I needed @to put it in the album.
Because there's no happiness without @also having sad and painful things.
I talked to Ryo about it, and she said @it's better to remember,
so I decided to keep it so I wouldn't forget.
Ryo's album has things like those, too...
Take this photo of her school's chemistry lab, @for example.

group_1.textRight: An empty chemistry lab...? What's this about?

group_1.narration: "It was many years ago, but there was a girl @who died in the chemistry room after @a toxic gas was released during an experiment. @They haven't had a chemistry club since."

group_1.textLeft: So there's more than just happiness @in this album.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... But some of these photos I don't get.
Is this an open-street book market?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I happened to pass by it @at the shopping district.

group_1.narration: "Natsume Books was a bookstore, but @there was an arson attack on the store...@So they're trying to rebuild it piece by piece."
"The girl at the store said it's hard, though...@So much of the inventory was destroyed, @and her father, the owner, fell into depression..."

group_1.textRight: And this...is a festival?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, the Fire Festival of Takarazaki. @They're shutting it down permanently.
I went to see it one last time, and there were @a lot of people broken up about it...
It was a deeply cherished festival.

group_1.textRight: And this one! There was supposed to be @a candy store here!
Since when did it become an apartment @complex?!

group_1.narration: Looking back, I started photographing @people's smiles so I could preserve @those precious ordinary things @we take for granted, but gradually, @I started documenting sorrows as well.
But more and more, @it's left me feeling frustrated.
I think it's because I'm only preserving them, @and not actually doing anything about them...

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, and this is from when I fell down.
...But I've gotten way off-topic!
There was something I wanted @to tell you, Iroha!
I'm sure you've heard the stories of a lot @of people who've come to Mikazuki,
and I thought maybe you'd know something @about this, so I wanted to ask!
